2. Mayor - Duane Crocker

Mayor - Duane Crocker
=====================

Duane Crocker is the mayor of Victoria. A Victoria native, he is the principal shareholder in The Law Office of Duane G. Crocker, PC. He earned his bachelor’s degree in political science from Texas A&M University and his doctorate in law from Texas Tech University. Crocker is a member of the Victoria Sales Tax Development Corporation and the Executive Board and Board of Directors of the Victoria Economic Development Corporation. He previously served as the City Council representative for District 3. Prior to his election, he was appointed as a member of the City’s Charter Review Committee, and he has also held leadership roles with the Food Bank of the Golden Crescent, the Boys & Girls Club of Victoria, the Victoria ISD Education Foundation, and Parkway Baptist Church.

[Mayor's statement on Texas Senate Bill 2361 - Relating to the transfer of the University of Houston-Victoria to The Texas A&M University System](https://www.victoriatx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/16146/Mayors-Statement---SB-2361)
